txt.en:
'You're the one they picked to replace me?

Frankly I'm embarrassed for Bill already. It takes a real star to be the protagonist. Memorize all of your lines, even the long ones. Don't fidget, sneeze, or cough. Make sure that you're always acting heroic... the audience always wants you to come out on top.

Good luck... you'll need it to fill my shoes.'
Do you have any advice for me?
